wikipedia_page.main: Harry John Martin (born 23 October 1992) is an English field hockey player who plays as a midfielder for HC Rotterdam and the England and Great Britain national teams. His sister, Hannah Martin is an English field hockey player who plays as a midfielder or forward for England and Great Britain.

response: *Harry Martin (born 1992), Great Britain Hockey Team London 2012
Harry Martin is the name of:
*Harry Martin (field hockey) (born 1992), British field hockey player
*Harry Martin (judge) (1920–2015), former Associate Justice of the North Carolina Supreme Court
*Harry Martin (urologist) (1890–1961), medical director of 20th Century Fox Studios and third husband of Louella Parsons

Once a year SportsAid holds its prestigious One-to-Watch Award at its annual SportsBall in London. Previous winners include Tom Daley, Team GB hockey player Harry Martin, sprinter Sally Brown and gymnast Courtney Tulloch.
